content.query:
let Logs = Unifiedlog_CL 
| join kind=innerunique  Labels_CL on $left.SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g==$right.Guid_g
| extend MachineName_s = columnifexists("Common_DeviceName_s","");

let SummarizedLogs = Logs
| where isnotempty(MachineName_s)                
| summarize type = "Devices", value=dcountif(MachineName_s, TimeGenerated >= ago({TimeRange:grain})),                            
    previousValue=dcountif(MachineName_s, TimeGenerated < ago({TimeRange:grain}));

SummarizedLogs
| extend percentChange = strcat(tostring(((value - previousValue) / previousValue) * 100),'%')

let Logs = Unifiedlog_CL
| join kind=innerunique  Labels_CL on $left.SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g==$right.Guid_g 
| extend MachineName_s = columnifexists("Common_DeviceName_s",""), ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId_s",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Operation_s",""), LabelId_g = columnifexists("Id_g",""), Protected_b = columnifexists("Protected_b",FALSE);
let minTime = toscalar(Logs | where isnotempty(Common_DeviceName_s) | summarize min(TimeGenerated));
let dates = range ["date"] from bin(minTime, {TimeRange:grain}) to now() step {TimeRange:grain};

Logs
| where isnotempty(Common_DeviceName_s)
| summarize labels=countif(isnotempty(ObjectId_s) and isnotempty(Activity_s) and isnotempty(LabelId_g)),
protected=countif(isnotempty(ObjectId_s) and isnotempty(Activity_s) and Protected_b) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| join kind= rightouter (
    dates
)
on $left.TimeGenerated == $right.["date"]
| project ["date"], Labels = coalesce(labels, 0), ["Protected Labels"] = coalesce(protected, 0)
content.title: Label and Protect Activity

content.query:
let Logs = Unifiedlog_CL
| join kind=innerunique  Labels_CL on $left.SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g==$right.Guid_g
| extend MachineName_s = columnifexists("Common_DeviceName_s",""), UserId_s = columnifexists("UserId_s","");
let minTime = toscalar(Logs | where isnotempty(MachineName_s) | summarize min(TimeGenerated));
let dates = range ["date"] from bin(minTime, {TimeRange:grain}) to now() step {TimeRange:grain};
Logs
| where isnotempty(MachineName_s)
| summarize users=dcount(UserId_s), devices = dcount(MachineName_s) by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| join kind= rightouter
(
    dates
)
on $left.TimeGenerated == $right.["date"]
| project ["date"], users = coalesce(users, 0), devices = coalesce(devices, 0)
content.title: Users and Devices

content.query:
let Logs = Unifiedlog_CL 
| join kind=innerunique  Labels_CL on $left.SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g==$right.Guid_g
| extend LabelName_s = columnifexists("DisplayName_s",""), LabelId_g = columnifexists("Id_g",""), ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId_s",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Operation_s","");
Logs
| where isnotempty(LabelId_g)
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_s)
| where isnotempty(Activity_s)
| summarize value=count() by DisplayName_s
| order by value
content.title: Labels

content.query:
let Logs = Unifiedlog_CL 
| join kind=innerunique  Labels_CL on $left.SensitivityLabelEventData_SensitivityLabelId_g==$right.Guid_g
| extend ApplicationName_s = columnifexists("Common_ProcessName_s",""), LabelId_g = columnifexists("Id_g",""), ObjectId_s = columnifexists("ObjectId_s",""), Activity_s = columnifexists("Operation_s","");
Logs
| where isnotempty(LabelId_g)
| where isnotempty(ObjectId_s)
| where isnotempty(Activity_s)
| summarize value=count() by ApplicationName_s
| order by value
content.title: Labels by Application
